name: v1.9.5 Update
body:
## FAQ
 - N/A

## Changed:
- 1.19.1 Support.

## Fixed:
- Fixed why sticky shot was being weird.

## What is planned so far for the future?
-  [ ] A configurable list of blocks for auto smelt.
-  [ ] Many code improvements ( include performance concerns where possible ).
-  [ ] A re-write of the commands.
-  [ ] A better configuration system and more data types to pick from.
-  [ ] The plugin menus for Gkitz, Tinkerer and other menus will be re-written as to allow easier updates for new features.
-  [X] 1.17 support & below will be dropped. 1.18 & above will be the only versions supported. 
-  [ ] Make a proper api for the plugin.
-  [X] Fix Silkspawners support
-  [ ] A rewrite for how enchants are used.

This is still a work in progress. Suggestions are welcome.

body:
### Note: 
This is still a work in progress. Suggestions are welcome.

## FAQ

## New Enchantments:

## Fixed:
- Fixed #648 
- Fixed #643
- Fixed #639
- Fixed #660

- Fixed bugs regarding enchantments / blast not working etc.
- Fixed why cloud particles wouldn't remove.

## Changed:

## What is planned so far for the future?

name: v2.0 Dev Build v1 Update
body:
### Note: 
This is still a work in progress. Suggestions are welcome.

## FAQ
 - Why is Silk Spawners giving an error? Downgrade it until it works or use another plugin like WildStacker

## Added:
- Copper & Ancient Debris has been added to auto-smelt

## New Enchantment:
- N/A

## Fixed:
- Fixed improper logging warnings in the console.

## Changed:
- Removed some useless tasks

## What is planned so far for the future?
- A configurable list of blocks for auto smelt.
- Many code improvements ( include performance concerns where possible )
- A re-write of the commands
- A better configuration system and more data types to pick from.
- The plugin menus for Gkitz, Tinkerer and other menus will be re-written as to allow easier updates for new features.
- 1.12 support & below will be dropped. 1.16.5 and above will be the only supported versions as the others from 1.13+ up to 1.16.4 are useless to be on.
- Make a proper api for the plugin.

## Re-added Enchantments:
- N/A

name: v1.8 Dev Build v9 Update
body:
### Note: 
This is not the full changelog as I did not have time to go through all the changes to figure out everything that changed. I have not posted a full update in a long time. 

## Added:
- Updated /ce debug to include null enchantment types.
- Failed dust has been added to tab completion.
- Support for SaberFactions.
- Support for SuperiorSkyblock. Thanks to @OmerBenGera 
- The names of each mob for ally enchantments can be edited in the config.yml.
- Hex color support.
- 1.16 support.

## New Enchantment:
- BeeKeeper will spawn Bees around the player to help fight for the user. Thanks to gm1224 for this Pull Request.

## Fixed:
- Fix protection crystal dupe glitch.
- NPE from gkitz.
- The Blast enchantment doesn't drop items when using a furnace or auto smelt with it.
- Fixed NPE when a CEPlayer isn't found for rage.
- If an enchantment does not have the option Enchantment-Type: in the Enchantments.yml it causes that enchantment's type to be null and stop working.
- Using old gkit files from CE 1.7.9.3.2 down caused no enchantments to show on the items.
- Fixed Gkit preview.
- Fixed issue with tab complete not working.
- Fixed NME for 1.8.8 servers.
- Fixed Experience enchantment working on silk touch items.
- Fixed HellForge not working on equipped items and 1.13+.
- 1.13.2- had an issue where (Telepathy + Silk Touch) and (Telepathy + Silk Touch + Blast) caused items like lapis ore to give the ink instead of the ore.
- Fixed Blast would give EXP even with silktouch.
- Fixed GKitz preview not scaling with item total.
- Fixed NPE from tinker GUI.
- Fixed BlackSmith not allowing enchanted items.
- Fixed shulker boxes not dropping when using telepathy on it.
- Disarmer was not working.
- Failed dust was coded to be allowed in the /cc dust command but due to a bug, it wasn't available.
- Using the enchantment Telepathy and breaking a block that has a torch or flower on top of it causes it to now drop.
- Fixed Telepathy giving 1 to many items.
- Player heads on 1.13+ could not activate helmet enchantments.
- Fixed rare NPE from Telepathy and Blast.
- NPE when hooking into GriefProtection.
- Fixed issue with items making missing textures with some enchantments.
- Telepathy enchantment caused duplications sometimes for some blocks due to async.
- Sugar Cane would not break correctly. Now it breaks from top-down to the broken block. This allows for easier farming as it doesn't remove the whole plant if breaking the middle.
- Fixed error from StackMobs Legacy.
- When CE converts the old v1.7 gkit file to work with the new system it removes the old "customenchantments:" and "enchantments:" placeholders. It removed the "enchantments:" 1st and so caused the 1st enchantment to be called "custom<encchantment name>".
- Furnace + Blast + Fortune would not give the right amount of items but instead, give less.
- AutoSmelt would not give extra items when using Blast + AutoSmelt + Telepathy.
- Fixed MCMMO classic errors for MCMMO Parties.
- Some blocks like Glowstone give multiple items and so if using silk touch the amount needs to override to be 1.
- Fixed ally enchantments only working 1s.
- Fixed issue where aura enchantments ignore towny.

## Changed:
- Lots of work went into trying to optimize all the enchantments and make them run smoother.
- Optimized enchantment checking by caching all the info instead of grabbing new info all the time.
- Lots of internal methods were changed and moved to be more organized.
- Recoded some bow enchantments to make it easier to add new ones in the future.
- Wings now only check on the PlayerMoveEvent when the player moves a block instead of whenever they move.
- Updated SupportPlugins to use a cached state system.
- The Support class has gone through a big recode to allow for the new system of checking faction plugins. This had to be done to allow SaberFactions to be added for support.
- Recoded how the ally enchantments work.
- Updated Towny hook to 95.2.0.

## Re-added Enchantments:
- Cyborg
  - Speed 1
  - Strength 2
  - Jump 2
- Sniper
  - Poison 2
  - Lasts 5s
  - 25% chance (+5% per level)

name: v1.8 Dev Build v8
body:
## Added:
- Added support for 1.15 and 1.15.1.
- New option for wings called Limitless-Flight-Worlds: This allows players in the listed worlds to fly for a limitless amount of time and bypass enemy checks.
- Potions and Tipped Arrows can now be colored and have a potion effect on it. Just by adding another ":" after the 1st option it allows you to add another option to it.
Example:
  - 'Item:Potion:Red:Speed'
- Update to the latest FactionsUUID API.
- Added Neutral as an enemy.
- `/ce limit` will show the user information about their enchantment limit. It shows if they have a limit bypass if it counts vanilla enchantments in their limit, their current enchantment limit, and how many enchantments are on their item in their hand.

## Fixed:
- NPE when loading due to missing options.
- NPE when checking if an enchantment is activated.
- NPE when checking if an item can be enchanted.
- NPE when trying to tab-complete broken enchantments.
- NPE from bow enchantments.
- NPE from mob spawn enchantments.
- OutOfBounds when getting enchantments on an item.
- OutOfBounds error when setting a customizer option to a slot bigger than the inventory size.
- OutOfBounds error in ShopManager.
- NoClassDefFoundError error from bows on 1.12.2-.
- Fixed lostbook name placeholder being case sensitive.
- 1.9+ servers get errors due to missing sound name.
- Enchantments that are disabled could still be obtained from the shop.
- Fixed issue with lightning enchantments hurting protected entities.
- When telepathy broke skull items it made them lose the skin they had before. Telepathy now does not pick up heads to protect their skins.
- Lightning enchantments could cause an infinite loop due to how checks are calling the same event that is being checked and so it is being checked in an infinite loop without ignoring the event instead.
- Due to a spigot update in 1.14.4+, it broke blast and telepathy from giving blocks.
- When checking for the number of enchantments including vanilla enchantments it would set the amount found to be ONLY the amount of vanilla enchantments are on the item. It would not include the custom ones because the vanilla number would overwrite the custom amount instead of adding to it.
- Fixed Abstract Arrow class being called on 1.13 when it is 1.14+.
- Planter enchantment would cause infinite food.
- Some blocks did not drop items when using telepathy.
- Fixed unbreakable items losing textures due to some enchantments.

## Code Changes:
- Recoded the ItemBuilder.convertString() method.
- Added getFromName methods to Dust and Scrolls classes.
- Recoded command classes.
- Wings class has been recoded to be more efficient.
- Replaced old SkipBreakEvents methods to new IgnoreEvents methods. This allows for universal event checking.
- Changed lightning enchantment damage cause to custom since its not real lightning.
- Updated coding style. 
- Removed old limit checker.

name: v1.8 Dev Build v7
body:
## Fixed:
- NPE from PlotSquared support.
- NPE from hoe enchantments.
- NPE from the blast enchantment.
- NPE when the category doesn't have any enchantments.
- Destroy_Rate would not be disabled when the placeholder is removed.
- Fixed Category Max and Min levels not working.
- Fixed hasEnchantment using the wrong color code.
- NPE from when checking for CEBooks.
- OutOfBounds error when checking for enchantments.
- NPE from LostBook trying to use a sound that isn't real.
- Fixed LostBook sound was always disabled.
- Fixed broken placeholder option.
- Fixed LostBooks placeholder not working on the name.
- Fixed IllegalArgumentException from dropping air.
- Missing check to see if the cursor item is a crystal.
- BlackScrolls only gave level one enchantment books.
- Breaking a shulker box with Blast enchantment would clear the inventory.
- NPE from the enchantments.yml when trying to set an enchantment to a category that doesn't exist in the config.yml.
- NPE when using the /ce lostbook command and using a category that isn't a real value.
- Multiarrow arrows can be picked up.
- Fixed GKitz's option in shop GUI opening Black Smith GUI.
- Fixed issue with the Gkitz back button not working.

## Updated:
- ItemBuilder class has been updated and now supports a bunch of new options.
You can learn about all the options that are now available to use here: https://github.com/badbones69/Crazy-Enchantments/wiki/Items:-option-values

## Added:
- Made factions with truces not damage each other.
- Prevent armor aura effects on or from vanished players.
- All new ItemBuilder options are now supported in these options.
  - GKitz Items:
  - GKitz Item Customizer
  - Shop ItemCustomizer

## Changed:
- Enchantment Checking is more reliable.

## Code Changes:
- Renamed ShopControler class to ShopControl.
- Added CEnchantment#canEnchantItem(ItemStack) method.
- Redid dependencies to all use maven.
- Updated to new Feudal API.
- Updated the Messages class for less redundancy.
- Replaced most methods with ArrayList with List
- Optimizes the AuraListener class to be more efficient and easier to read.
- Optimized CommandChecker class.
- Optimized the Scrambler class.
- Optimized ScrollControl class.
- Optimized Dust class.
- Recoded Gkitz class a bit.
- Optimized the ProtectionCrystal class.
  - `ProtectionCrystal.isSuccessfull(Player)` has been deprecated and will be replaced with `ProtectionCrystal.isProtectionSuccessful(Player)`.
- Recoded how the Shop feature is handled.
  - New ShopManager class to help handle the shops GUI.
  - New ShopOption class that handles all the options that will show in the Shop's GUI. This does not affect the enchantment books or lost books though.
  - The shop is no longer built every time the GUI needs opening but instead, the ItemBuilders and slots are all stored in HashMaps in the ShopManager class. Then the items are set to the inventory when needed.
- Added new method to get call enchantments in a category.
New Methods in the Category Object:
  - getEnchantmentList(); Gets a list of a CEnchantment object registered to that category.
  - addEnchantment(CEnchantment enchantment); registers an enchantment to that category. This is handled automatically when an enchantment is registered.
  - removeEnchantment(CEnchantment enchantment); This removes a registered enchantment from the category. This is handled automatically when an enchantment is unregistered.

name: v1.8 Dev Build v6.1
body:
This is just a smaller update to add more stability to the plugin.

Added:
- Vanilla enchantments now show in the /ce add command tab-complete.

Optimized:
- BlackSmith has had a huge optimization and is much more responsive.
- Book checking has been optimizes to be quicker.
- Firework API class has been optimized and uses much fewer resources.

Fixed:
- A small error in Tiller enchantment's description.
- Disabled enchantments still showed in the preview GUIs.
- Haste and Oxengenate did not work.
- Duplication bug with blast enchantment that happened with only specific plugins installed.
- Spelling mistakes here and there.
- Books bought from the shop would not glow even if toggled on in the config.yml.
- NPE from some enchantment when checking if the item had that enchantment.
- The lightning sound would cause NPE in 1.8.8.
- Scrolls did not use the unstack item message from the messages.yml.
- Using a black scroll on an item while having a full inventory would cause the enchantment book to disappear.
- PlotSquared would cause errors when using an older version of the plugin on older servers.

name: v1.8 Dev Build v6
body:
## Added:
- New Enchantment-Type.yml. This new file now controls all stuff in about the Enchantment Info GUI. This also controls all the types every enchantment can be assigned to. You can add and remove new types as you wish.
- New RegisteredCEnchantmentEvent for when CEnchantment objects are registered.
- New UnregisterCEnchantmentEvent for when CEnchantment objects are unregistered.
- New message for the enchantment Disorder in the Messages.yml. If set to blank it will not send any message.
- Every command now has a TabComplete option when hitting tab. It will auto-suggest inputs for the user.

## New Enchantments:
- StickyShot has a 10%(+10% per level) chance to spawn a web where it hits. It also spawns a 3x3 area under an entity if hit.
- Disorder has a 1%(+1% per level) chance to disorder the enemies hot-bar.
- Charge gives you and nearby allies a speed boost when you kill a player.
- Revenge gives you speed regeneration and haste when an ally is killed nearby.
- BattleCry has a 10%(+5% per level) to send nearby enemies flying backward.
- Famished has a 10%(+5% per level) to give the enemy hunger.
- Greenthumb has a 10%(+10% per level) chance to fully grow crops but at the cost of the hoe's durability.
- Harvest will break all fully grown crops in a 3x3 area.
- Tiller automatically tills a 3x3 area when tilling the ground and will hydrate the soil if within 4 blocks of a water source.
- Planter will automatically plant the seed in your off-hand or the next one in your hot-bar.

## Enchantment Integration:
- GreenThumb and Planter can be used together to fully grow a seed when planted. (Depends if greenthumb chance is successful for all spots.)
- GreenThumb, Planter, and Tiller can be used together to plant a fully grown 3x3 area of crops. (Depends if greenthumb chance is successful for all spots.)
- Harvester and Telepathy can be used together to pick up all crops in a 3x3 area and put it straight into your inventory.

## Fixed:
- WG and WE were required to use CE otherwise it would error and disable.
- Book names that start with &f would cause errors. It is due to how MC handles the &f color code at the beginning of items. Instead of leaving it in the name of the item it instead removes it from the name if its the 1st thing at the beginning of the name.
- Bunch of random spelling mistakes.
- When the allowed block list was limited, a blast pick no longer broke the target block unless it was in the block list.
- Error when a sound is played that doesn't exist.

## Removed:
- Removed SimpleClans support due to it being outdated.
- Info GUI settings have been moved from the Messages.yml file to the new Enchantment-Types.yml file.

## Updated:
- [StackMob](https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/29999/) has been updated.
- Category class has been fully recoded and uses new Objects instead of strings.
- LostBook class has been fully recoded and uses new Objects instead of strings.
- Some methods have been recoded and renamed.

Thanks to @Hitosherizu and @pmme for the pull requests they made for this update. <3

name: v1.8 Dev Build v5
body:
### Added:
- 1.8.8-1.12.2 support has been re-added due to many many MANY requests.
- Lightning-Sound-Range: <distance in blocks> option in the config to control how far lightning sounds can be heard from.
- WorldGuard v6 and v7 support has been added.
- All files with version specific item names have been separated to 1.12.2-Down and 1.13-Up files so that the files that regenerate their files will get the correct file for their Minecraft version.


### Fixed:
- The wings enchantment particle would not show when enabled.
- Players in creative mode would drop XP when using the blast enchantment on some blocks.
- The Blast enchantment would not obey protection regions due to checking in sync while the code is still firing async.
- When mass breaking blocks with Blast and Efficiency it would cause errors to spam console.
- Error when trying to fire an event while async and causing issues on 1.14+ servers.
- When opening mystery dust it would give a huge amount of other dust when opened.
- When using the /ce dust <type> [amount] [player] [percent] command to give specific dust it only gives one dust instead of the specific amount.
- 1.13+ would not break Grass blocks by default with blast due to the item name change to Grass_Block instead of Grass.
- BlackSmith's result CEBook would not glow even if the toggled on.
- In 1.9+ right-clicking a CEBook would say the description 2x.
- Could not break a block while having a CEBook in your hand.
- Decapitation and Headless would never give player heads.
- Pull, Piercing, IceFreeze, and Doctor enchantments would not work.

### Removed:
- The default Gkitz.yml gave items with aqua infinity on them even though they are not helmets.

### Updated:
- Metrics class due to 1.14 library changes.

name: v1.8 Dev Build v4
body:
Added:
- Support for Candc's SilkSpawner plugin.
Plugin: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/60063/
- Support for Factions3 has been added.
Plugin: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/63602/
- Sticky-Shot enchantment has been added. When landing on a block it has a chance to spawn a web where it hits. If it hits a player/mob it will spawn a 3x3 web layer around the player.
- TURTLE_HELMET(armor/helmet), TRIDENT(weapon), SHEARS(tool), FISHING_ROD(all), ELYTRA(all) were missing from being enchantable items.
- bStats metrics to replace MassiveStats.

Fixed:
- When adding a custom enchantment before any vanilla enchantments it would add the hide enchantment tag to make the item glow as if it had a real enchantment on it. But doing this makes all vanilla enchantments become hidden due to this.
- Telepathy sometimes giving ink sacks instead of lapis lazuli.
- Anvil duplication bug when putting a black scroll on the resulting item in an anvil.
- Rage enchantment would spam rage turning on due to it not being turned on correctly.
- Spelling errors found around the files and code.

Changed:
- All placeholders in the Messages.yml are now lowercase as capitalization options were removed from sone of them.
- Lightning enchantments now play the sound effect to the local players instead of worldwide.

Code Changes:
- All "Power" methods have been renamed to Level.
- EnchantedArrows object class to help with figuring out what enchantments, shooter, and item the arrow that was shot had. This helps make getting enchantments from that bow easier.
- Switched from particle library to Spigot's particle spawn method.
- Excluded bukkit from dependencies in the pom.
- Updated methods for getting inventory names to help make updating to 1.14 later on smoother.
- Disable item drops for Blast enchantment instead of setting to nothing to help compatibility with other plugins and achievements.
- Redundant code found was removed.
- Updated some dependencies for better 1.13 compatibility.

*Thanks a lot to @pmme for the great pull requests and helping me out <3

name: v1.8 Dev Build v3
body:
Added:
- World Guard and World Edit support for v7.0 of the plugins has been added.
- New Messages class to help to make controlling messages easier in the code.
- Gkit feature can now be toggled on and off via toggle option in the config.yml.
- Fake Items to the Gkitz GUI.
- BlastUseEvent for when the blast enchantment is used.

Changed:
- Reworked the Blast Enchantment to run async to try and help lower any lag it might make. Also changed how it checks enchantments to help same some resources also.
- Organized some code to make it cleaner.
- Changed the glass color of PeaceKeeper and Villain GKitz.
- Renamed the World Guard support class to fix any name conflicts.

Removed:
- MassiveStats has been removed due to its shutdown.
- Vault repository due to it being down and causing the build time to be super long.
- Old #.spigot() method was removed since it doesn't exist anymore.

Fixed:
- NPE from axes class.
- NPE from armor class.
- NPE from towny class.
- NPE from grief protection class.
- Tinker not accepting items.
- Pixaxe enchantments not giving the right amount of lapis items.
- A lot of misspellings in files.

name: v1.8 Dev Build v2
body: Updated the whole plugin to MC 1.13-pre7 only. Will work on making it fully MC 1.13 when Spigot Stable 1.13 is fully released.

name: v1.8 Dev Build v1
body:
Here is the current v1.8 Dev Build v1. Warning to anyone who wishes to use this. It is possible there are bugs. Not everything has been tested.

All file changes can be found on the GitHub.
Most changes can be found in the *Needs Tested* section of the Trello.

GitHub Code: https://github.com/kicjow/Crazy-Enchantments/tree/v1.8
GitHub Config Files: https://github.com/kicjow/Crazy-Enchantments/tree/v1.8/crazyenchantments/src/main/resources
Trello Page: https://trello.com/b/Bn7rO5Up/crazy-enchantments
